system.description:
At 6th level, as a veteran combat-tinkerer you specialize in certain aspects of warfare.

Caravan Smithing

You have advantage on checks made to repair vehicles, and you are always considered to have access to a forge when repairing a vehicle. In addition, during a short rest you can either repair any malfunction a vehicle is suffering or restore up to 50 of the vehicleâ€™s hit points at the cost of 25 gold in materials.
